Instruction: In a saucepan, combine red raspberries, balsamic vinegar, and sugar.
Place the saucepan over medium heat and bring the mixture to a boil.
Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it thickens and coats the back of a spoon.
Remove the saucepan from heat and let the raspberry balsamic glaze cool slightly.
Strain the mixture through a fine mesh sieve to remove the raspberry seeds.
Allow the glaze to cool completely before transferring it to a jar or container.
Store the raspberry balsamic glaze in the refrigerator until ready to use.
